title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.5 - Vacation accrual subsequent to exchange election
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 566.5 - Vacation accrual subsequent to exchange election

State Regulations

Vacation credits designated for exchange will be segregated
from the employee's accrued vacation credits for future cash payment and such
days will not be included in the accrued credits of the employee for the
purpose of disallowing subsequent vacation credits within the limits otherwise
prescribed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
566.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
